messages.message:
Kelsey
Hawaii. The air rates are going to go up soon, the camping reservations are going to be filled. I want to gauge commitment.

Airfare: from phoenix to honolulu, oahu: $393 via hawaiin airlines
Campsite: http://www.hawaiistateparks.org/parks/oahu/malaekahana.cfm $18 a night for 6 people. Running water, showers, beach camping. It's on the north shore, which is safer. But there is a degree of risk.

Transportation: there's a bus system that goes all around the entire island, including the campsite. $2.00-$2.50 a pop.

Groceries are about 2-3 times as expensive but eating out is about the same, 6-7 $.

Please let me know your level of commitment
Hawaii State Parks > Parks > Oahu > Malaekahana State Recreation Area
Location: Off Kamehameha Highway (Highway 83), Malaekahana Beach: Kalanai Point Section 0.6 mile north of La'ie town; Kahuku Section 1.3 miles north of La'ie town.
hawaiistateparks.org

Joseph
Could you give me the flight info so I can book the same flight? Also should I go to Austrailia with you? or no?

Teresa
what are the planned activities if I were to go?

Kelsey
Jumping off waterfalls. Hikes. Backpacking. Boogie boarding. Northshore sand castles. Pearl Harbor Sites. snorkling.

Joseph
Sounds pretty lame to me. Maybe I don't want to go actually.

Teresa
did you already buy your ticket kels?

Kelsey
hanaumau bay preserve. nightlife. hula luaou. Ioani Palace
Nope
But I want to soon, before the tickets go up!!

Teresa
which island are you flying into?

Kelsey
Oahu!
That's where Honolulu is
And it has the most stuff to do, and its the prettiest!

Teresa
ok
what are the dates?

Kelsey
Feb 1- Feb 7, you're birthday!!!
WOW
that's embarrassing
your*

Teresa
hmmm $600 round trip

Kelsey
from santa barbara!!

Teresa
yep

Kelsey
YAY! I knew you would never miss something awesome like this!

Teresa
no i did not say yep to HI
i said yep to the fact that it is coming from SB
it is so expensive
well, maybe i can do it, how much is the hotel?

Teresa
i said yep to the fact that it is coming from SB
it is so expensive
well, maybe i can do it, how much is the hotel?

Joseph
You mean camping site, Teresa?

Teresa
it will be so wet if we do camp
Teresa Cvach added you.

Kelsey
We can always camp the weekend nights and squish into a hotel the weeknights

Teresa
ok
so for the camping site, is it $18 per person or total?

Kelsey
18 total!

Teresa
ok i will go

Joseph
wahooo

Kelsey
AWESOME!!!!

Teresa
i am asking time off tomorrow. go buy your ticket.

Kelsey
sweet! will do. i'll call you

Joseph
wahoo my 2 favorite people (I think, maybe) going to Hawaii, it's going to be awesome!!!!

Kelsey
Indeed!! and i think David is coming for the first part!!

Joseph
O David is not one of my favorite people, I think I might not go.

Kelsey
Haha David got p3nd.

Joseph
Haha just kidding David. Your one of my Favorite friends. SWEET!! I'm getting excited. Although it's still like 3 months away.
